Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Courtyard by Marriott Warsaw Airport in Warsaw, you'll be connected to the airport and convenient to Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre and Sluzewiec Racetrack. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Szczesliwice Ski Slope and Krolikarnia Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 236 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands. Additional amenities include wedding services and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Warsaw? This hotel has facilities measuring 10226 square feet (950 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands. Additional amenities include wedding services and a television in the lobby.
Make yourself at home in one of the 236 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

When you stay at Courtyard by Marriott Warsaw Airport in Warsaw, you'll be connected to the airport and convenient to Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre and Sluzewiec Racetrack. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Szczesliwice Ski Slope and Krolikarnia Palace.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Sluzewiec Racetrack - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Szczesliwice Ski Slope - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Krolikarnia Palace - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Wodny Park - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Blue City Shopping Centre - 4.9 km / 3 mi
National Library of Poland - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Belweder Palace - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Warsaw International Expocentre - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Warsaw University of Technology - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Frideric Chopin's Monument - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Chancellery of Prime Minster of Poland - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Warsaw University Botanical Garden - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Sadyba Best Mall - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Lazienki Park - 6.4 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for Courtyard by Marriott Warsaw Airport is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: Please be advised that the pricing for this room type is for 2 adults only. For any additional guests, there is an extra person fee of 108 - 128 PLN per adult/night to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
